Back in the old days when DOOM first came out, ID Software made a version of DOOM that anyone can play for free, which contained the first episode of DOOM. This version of DOOM became known as the Shareware Version, because it was software licensed under the Shareware License. This version of DURAG is the "Shareware" equivalent (not in licensing terms however) to the previously mentioned.
